short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Smart Web Assistant is a Chrome extension that enhances your browsing with AI-powered insights from both cloud and local models.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Smart Web Assistant can operate on local servers that are compatible with OpenAI's API, such as Exllamav2, Llama.cpp, or VLLM, among others.

Overview:

Smart Web Assistant is a powerful Chrome extension that leverages advanced AI technology to provide real-time, context-aware insights directly on the web pages you visit. Whether you're using OpenAI's cloud API or local AI models like llama or mistral, this tool is designed to boost your productivity and enhance your understanding of web content in multiple languages.

Why Install Smart Web Assistant?

Instant Insights: Get immediate, relevant information and answers based on the current web content you're viewing, enhancing both comprehension and productivity.
Multi-Language Support: Communicate with the AI in various languages, making it an ideal companion for both multilingual users and those learning new languages.
Customizable Interactions: Tailor the AI's responses by configuring API settings directly within your browser, ensuring a personalized experience.
Secure and Reliable: All settings, including sensitive API keys, are securely stored in Chrome’s local storage, ensuring that your configurations remain consistent and private.
Efficiency at Your Fingertips: With up to five customizable shortcuts, access your most frequently used queries quickly, saving time and streamlining your workflow.
Key Features:

User-Friendly Interface: Designed for ease of use, the interface allows you to navigate seamlessly and manage settings with minimal effort.
Flexible API Integration: Choose between using OpenAI's cloud service or your own local models, with support for custom API endpoints and model names.
How It Works:

Browse: Simply navigate to any website.
Query: Activate the extension to use a shortcut or enter a new prompt, and receive AI-generated insights relevant to the content on your screen.
Configure: Easily adjust API connections, language settings, and shortcut commands all within the extension’s interface.
Smart Web Assistant is the ultimate tool for professionals, students, and anyone looking to supercharge their internet experience. By integrating cutting-edge AI directly into your browser, it transforms how you interact with digital content, making every browsing session more informative and productive.

Privacy and Security Commitment:

We take your privacy seriously. Smart Web Assistant processes all information locally within your browser and does not transmit personal data externally. For peace of mind, all configuration data, including API keys, are encrypted and stored securely within your own device. For more details on our privacy practices, please review our comprehensive Privacy Policy.

Transform your browsing experience today by installing Smart Web Assistant—where intelligence meets convenience right in your Chrome browser!
